Text: The Sweet Dew Incident ("Ganlu incident", or 甘露之變 ) refers to an incident on December 14, 835, where Emperor Wenzong of the Chinese Tang dynasty, angry about the power that the eunuchs had, conspired with the chancellor Li Xun and the general Zheng Zhu to slaughter the eunuchs.
